backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user management, access control, document storage metadata, and category/office structures with admin-restricted operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI feature changes, affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, hooks, components, styles, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining OKLCH theme tokens, dark mode variants, and base styling for background, text, borders, and components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with authentication and role-based route guards, wrapping pages in AppShell and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper that prompts Internet Identity login and shows a loading screen during initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-checking component that restricts access to user or admin routes and displays unauthorized messages when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/Unauthorize: Unauthorized access screen showing a warning icon, message, and optional button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Provides action buttons for viewing, downloading, and deleting a document with confirmation dialogs and navigation.
Implements document filter controls for category, office, direction, date range, and search text.
Renders a selectable table of documents with category, office, direction, and navigation to document details.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Displays a placeholder UI encouraging users to upload their first document.
Defines the main application layout with header navigation, theme toggle, and user menu.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCallerRole: Fetches and exposes the caller's role, including admin and user checks.
frontend/src/features/categories/useCate: Loads category data from the backend using react-query.
Provides mutations for adding, updating, and removing categories and offices with query invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/useDashb: Fetches dashboard metric data from the backend.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: Handles document deletion and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document’s details by ID using react-query.
Fetches and client‑filters documents with pagination using React Query and actor API.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles document upload by reading file bytes, encoding to base64, sending metadata, and invalidating queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, manages login flow, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode tokens, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Provides helpers to format category labels and map categories into select options.
frontend/src/lib/exportDocuments.ts: Converts document metadata into CSV and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Returns office options and resolves office names from category data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics and category navigation with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed document info with preview, metadata, and actions, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Provides a filterable, paginated document list with selection and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Manages categories and offices with dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Handles uploading documents with validation, metadata fields, progress, and success feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing UI updates, button styling changes, and a dashboard bug where 'Documents by direction' incorrectly reports 0. Includes existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for sourcing counts from backend data.
